summary.span: 获取键/值对的集合，它表示传递给此 的子元素的信息。

span.span: An enumeration of string-string key-value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Baggage` 进行序列化时请求将保留 （以及 ID) 的过程。`Baggage` is serialized when requests leave the process (along with the ID). 通常情况下，`Baggage`细化控制日志记录的活动及其所有子级使用。Typically, `Baggage` is used for fine-grained control over logging of the activity and any children. 一般情况下，如果在运行时不使用数据，则应使用相反。In general, if you are not using the data at runtime, you should be using instead.

The activity ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ID 具有层次结构： `root-id.id1_id2.id3_`。An ID has a hierarchical structure: `root-id.id1_id2.id3_`. 生成 ID 时称为通过追加后缀`Activity.Parent.Id`或。The ID is generated when is called by appending a suffix to the `Activity.Parent.Id` or the . 不具有任何 ID，直到它开始。An has no ID until it starts. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Id 格式](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format)。For more information, see [Id Format](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format).

summary.span: 获取操作名称。

span.span: Gets the operation name.
The name of the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 操作名称是*粗糙*非常有用的名称进行分组/筛选。An operation name is the *coarsest* name that is useful for grouping/filtering. 名称通常是一个编译时常量。The name is typically a compile-time constant. Rest Api 的名称都是合理的但参数 （例如特定的帐户） 不应在名称中但而不是在标记中。Names of Rest APIs are reasonable, but arguments (such as specific accounts) should not be in the name but rather in the tags.

span.span: The parent of this , if it is from the same process, or if this instance has no parent (it is a root activity) or if the parent is from outside the process.

summary.span: 获取此活动父级的 ID。

span.span: Gets the ID of this activity's parent.

span.span: The parent ID, if one exists, or if it does not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此父来自进程之外不具有父级，但*可能*具有父 ID （其中已从反序列化父级）。If the parent for this comes from outside the process, the does not have a parent but *may* have a parent ID (which was deserialized from the parent). 此属性的值可以是`null`如果这是根(即不具有)。This property value can be `null` if this is a root (i.e. it has no ). 请参阅[Id 格式](href="https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format)的更多详细信息。See [Id Format](href="https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/src/System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource/src/ActivityUserGuide.md#id-format) for more details.
